statements: UPDATE WeatherData SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WeatherData SET humidity = 55.2, solar_intensity = 450.7 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE WeatherData SET temperature = 30.5, humidity = 60.0 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WeatherData SET solar_intensity = 200.0, temperature = 25.0 WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE Researcher SET affiliation = 'University A' WHERE researcher_id = '1234-5678-9101-1121';
UPDATE SolarData SET location = 'California' , weather_condition = 'Sunny' , solar_energy_generation = 500.75 WHERE data_id = '9876-5432-1098-7654';
UPDATE SolarData SET solar_energy_generation = 2000.5 WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE Researcher SET affiliation = 'Research Institute' WHERE first_name = 'Alice' AND last_name = 'Smith';
UPDATE Researchers SET email = 'researcher@example.com' WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE WeatherData SET precipitation = 10.5, temperature = 25.8 WHERE data_id = 1234;
UPDATE Researchers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE WeatherData SET temperature = 28.5, precipitation = 5.3 WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE WeatherData SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 50.0 WHERE location = 'New York';
UPDATE Researchers SET email = 'researcher@example.com', institution = 'New University' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WeatherData SET temperature = temperature + 2, humidity = 60 WHERE location = 'New York';
UPDATE SolarEnergyData SET energy_generated = energy_generated * 1.1 WHERE solar_panel_id = 123;
UPDATE researchers SET research_topic = 'Machine Learning' WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE weather_conditions SET precipitation = 0.5, temperature = 25.5 WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE researchers SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', research_topic = 'Data Analysis' WHERE researcher_id = 1;
UPDATE research_results SET conclusion = 'The experiment was successful' WHERE result_id = 1;
